page.title: 14Thomas Harris by Paul
page.content: Tom Harris was awarded a V.C. for bravery.He was killed in action in World war 1.He was killed but he was brave.In World War 1 he was in a trench with a group of soldiers.He jumped out of the trench and ran to about six machine gunners in an enemy trench.Tom Harris shot the German machine gunners one by one until the last one shot him.The last German didn't get away.That is why my Great Uncle Tom was awarded the Victoria Cross. There is an old peoples home in Halling named after him and there is a plaque in Harris House to commemorate his bravery.At one time only people from Halling lived there but now three men and eighteen women from all over England are living in Harris House, which was built in the 1971.
